value.name: Family Of Maurice Granton Jr. Sues City Over Fatal Police Shooting
value.description: The family of 24-year-old Maurice Granton Jr. is suing the Chicago Police Department for wrongful death, after an officer shot and killed Granton in the Bronzeville neighborhood last month.

value.name: Maurice Granton Jr.
value.description: Family Of Maurice Granton Jr. Sues City Over Fatal Police ShootingPolice said Granton pulled out a gun during a foot chase and was shot in an “armed encounter.” His family said he was unarmed.
